txt.en: Defeat many crazed hate-mongers in Skirmishes.\nThis deed will only be advanced by Lieutenants that do not appear grey to your character, they must be around the same level as you are.
Defeat many crazed hate-mongers in Skirmishes
Paying close attention to the strange behaviours of the crazed hate-mongers, you have learned exactly when to place your killing blow.
